metadata.title: CVE-2020-28851 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In x/text in Go 1.15.4, an "index out of range" panic occurs in language.ParseAcceptLanguage while parsing the -u- extension. (x/text/language is supposed to be able to parse an HTTP Accept-Language header.)

notes.note: amurray> google-guest-agent contains a vendored copy of golang-golang-x-text

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-text package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
